Disassemble the program and find the main function, there is only one variable that is initialized. The value of the variable is 0x4d2 orâ€1234â€ in ASCII. Pass â€œ1234â€ as the input to the program and the window will shut down. To see the output of the program, load the executable into a debugger and find the same location you were at by running the program until it stops. Put a couple breakpoints on following instructions and the program should output â€œYou cracked it!â€ a handful of times.
